Read task.description: Reads task by id and returns its data

Get Space Tasks.description: Get all tasks of the space

Get My Spaces.description: Retrieve all spaces for the current user

Change Column.description: Change the cloumn for a task

Get Project Boards.description: Get all boards of the project

Get Space Boards.description: Get all boards of the space

Get Space Projects.description: Get all projects of the space

Get Space Users.description: Get the list of all users of the space

backend_actions.description: A service for managing git projects and repositories.

Create issue.description: Creates an issue in the repository

Delete issue.description: Deletes an issue from the repository

Edit issue.description: Edits an issue in the repository

Get repo issues.description: Returns a list of issues in the repositories based on the provided filters

query_sheet.description: Performs SQL query on the sheet

postprocess_sheet.description: Postprocesses the result into a report
